data.eml:eml: Looking for Lepiotapsalion Huijser & Vellinga (Agaricales, Agaricaceae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vizzini, Alfredo, Tatti, Alessia, Huijser, Henk A., Liang, Jun F., Ercole, Enrico (2019): Looking for Lepiotapsalion Huijser & Vellinga (Agaricales, Agaricaceae). MycoKeys 52: 45-69, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.52.34021, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.52.34021
